Job Title: Senior Software Developer II (C , Windows, VS)
Job Description: Change the future with us !!!       Develops architectural designs and independently develops complex system designs that meet the product requirements.    Design, Debug , code, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable C code to develop application server(backend) HIS.    Consideration of the system architecture to build interfaces and the advance in software technology.    Provide technical leadership to the team, collaborators and customers.    Define, articulate, and apply and implement architectural principles and patterns; Perform architecture reviews and assessments.       Use your skills to move the world forward !!!       We are looking for professionals with 5 to 8 years in Software development    Expertise in C , Threading (Windows), synchronization, VB programming and C 11 advanced concepts.    Know how on Scripting like Perl, Batch.PL/SQL etc.    Working experience with Oracle Database. (Any version of Enterprise)    Thorough knowledge of the standard library, STL containers, MFC, COM and algorithms.    Knowledge of low-level threading primitives and real-time environments.    Excellent code analysis and Debugging skill (Microsoft Visual Studio IDE).    Experience architecting and deploying multi-tiered applications, using, and applying Architecture and Design patterns.    Knowledge in Static code Analysis and Unit Testing.
